testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Storing key pieces of release information As a user I want to see key release information captured So that I can validate the intended release for an application
--Output from -- Scenario: # StoreReleaseInfo.feature:6 Given a component has observed release information When viewing the component detailed history page Then it should show "Build Id", "Timestamp", "Annotations"
